attributes.review: I downloaded the app thinking it would clear my toe fungus but it just added on constipation, night sweats, uncontrollable projectile juicy farts and a large number of unexplainable hives all over my body. And I mean all over.... not only has my depression increased but my fear for little orange trolls has been through the roof. Save yourself.
attributes.title: Don’t do it.

attributes.review:
This the worst app I’ve ever used,❤️it deserves absolutely 0 stares, first of all when I first opened the app it asked for my number🤦‍♀️ that’s to personal, for legal reasons what I’m about to say is a joke,🙊 but trump actually payed 5 million dollars for the 1/5 stars he has, they were all payed boomers!!! 
Don’t let them fool you!!
#Bringbackobama2020❤️❤️
attributes.title: Savebarontrump2020

attributes.review: I have tried to imagine people actually using this app and have the slightest bit of common sense and intelligence, I failed. I was almost as big of a failure as the people who support this moron we sadly have to call a president for the next few months. Do not get this app it you have any literal brain cells left. :)
attributes.title: Imagine...

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app because Trump is my daddy and he so segsy or I though he was but yesterday when he kidnapped me and we did it it turns out he was only packing 1 1/2 inches and it wasn’t good at all and it was pretty weird becuz I’m a helicopter and I went vroom vroom and he finished and now I’m stuck in a cage in his room and therefore this deserves 1 star

attributes.title: DISGUSTING APP❤️🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: I downloaded this expecting to see Barron Trump, but I opened it up to see a huge picture of this orange looking man. I don’t know who this man is or why he’s there but someone told me it’s Barron Trump’s father?? why is his father on the app 😭 it says keep America great but I don’t see the president Barron Trump?? How can it be great without him? is this a joke or something? don’t get this app.
attributes.title: NO BARRON TRUMP???

attributes.review: Horrible it messed up my phone so bad.🍊 My phone quality is now jacked up.🍊 I don’t even know why they made this app🍊 I’m very disappointed I expected so much better considering this is an app for our president🍊 I bet an app about Obama could do better🍊 Do I recommend this?🍊 NO.🍊
attributes.title: Y’all better not vote for this orange mf again

attributes.review: When I first downloaded the app, my phone blew up. I went to the store and got a new phone, I decided to give the app a second try (HUGE MISTAKE) the first thing I saw when I opened the app was an ad to enlarge my penis? I don’t have one but I guess we know trumps demographic.... over all this app ruined my life 0/10
attributes.title: Wish I could do 0 stars

attributes.review: This app is an abomination and shouldn't even be on this app store!! It has glitched and crashed so many times I was incapable of doing anything and now his orange face keeps popping up when I am on my usual apps very scary guys!! I do not recommend  this terrible app don't download! I would give it ZERO stars if I could that is how atrocious this app is 😡
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!

attributes.review: Someone on Tiktok told people to give this app one star reviews and the post blew up. If you’re gonna actually use it, it’s a great app. Trump 2020. MAGA
attributes.title: Great App full of Fake Reviews
